title: So now that high elo players aren't allowed to make 5 man ranked teams
body: does this mean that they'll only allow 3/2/1 man teams in LCS and randomly match them up?

replies.body:
Shit dude you are right. 
I wanna see high elo players set up huge practice sessions with other teams through custom games

> [{quoted}](name=Silent Reaper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6fEAuacQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-02T18:21:23.778+0000)
>
> LOL, nice one OP

thanks i try

If their 'data' shows it will make them more money.

They've mis-matched teams by vote before.
O V E R W A T C H B O I Z
Do you really whine everyday on the forums? Not to be rude but it's nonstop crying with you. Are you ever satisfied?
Yeah I have no idea what they were thinking with that change.

Soon enough LCS will become a dynamic queue system where pro players can create premade of 2/3 people and get matched with random players, and at the end only 1 player can stand at the top of the ladder and will be the champion.
